title: M-COPE Learning Design for Strengthening Mobile-Based Science Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Building a mobile learning environment immediately applicable to workplace tasks for professionals

learning_goals: Students can collect, analyze, and visualize scientific experiment data using mobile devices
Students can apply the five elements of the M-COPE framework (mobile characteristics, conditions, performance, pedagogy, ethics) to actual learning activities
Students can share learning content in real-time with peers through a mobile app-LMS integrated system
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
